fulltext:
Full name: Dau Ngoc Nhat 
Technical Lead 
Email: xxx@gmail.com 
Mobile number: +84 xxxxxx567 
Nhat has gained the SAP Hybris certificate and has over 10 years of experience in software development 
including experience with complex SAP Hybris framework projects, enterprise web technology of Java (J2EE), 
and web java frameworks: Spring (Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud), Struts (1,2), Tapestry. He also 
has solid knowledge in Java core (J2SE), JavaScript, HTML, XML and experience working with many database 
systems, application servers.  
Moreover, Nhat has strong problem solving skills and experience in researching and applying new 
technologies. He is also a good team member. 
Nhat has the following qualifications: 
SAP Hybris Core Certified Developer, SAP Hybris Commerce Certified Developer. 
Technical Skills 
Languages 
: Java, C#, C++ (Visual C++), JavaScript, XML, HTML, CSS, Angular, ReactJs. 
Databases                    : Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgresSQL. 
Tools 
: Eclipse, Microsoft Visio, iReport, Docker. 
Frameworks 
: SAP Hybris, Spring (Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud), Struts (1,2), Tapestry, 
Liferay, Hibernate, iBatis, Velocity, Apache Solr, Axis2, Jasper Report, Quartz, Log4J. 
Web Servers 
: Apache Http Server, Nginx, IIS. 
Application Servers 
: Tomcat Server, JBoss, Oracle Weblogic. 
Operating Systems 
: Windows, Linux, Mac OS. 
Education 
2001-2006: University of Natural Sciences, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam _ Bachelor of Information Technology. 
Career Summary 
Dec 2017 – Present 
V-key, HCMC, Vietnam – Senior Software Engineer 
Jun 2012 – Dec 2017 
Sequent Asia IT (SAI Digital), HCMC, Vietnam - Senior Java developer, 
Technical Lead 
Sep 2011 – May 2012 
Pyramid Consulting VN, HCMC, Vietnam - Senior Java developer 
Dec 2008 – Jun 2011 
NetBlue VN, HCMC, Vietnam - Senior Java developer 
Mar 2008 – Nov 2008 
Officience, HCMC, Vietnam - Software developer 
Oct 2006 – Feb 2008 
FCGV, HCMC, Vietnam - Software engineer 
Professional Experience 
Organization:   V-key 
Project: Server Components 
Role: Senior Software Engineer 
Project Description 
V-key builds V-OS app is embedded in mobile devices so that it can protect required 
mobile applications. And V-key based on V-OS in order to provide security solutions 
(OTP, PKI, eKYC) for organizations (banks, governments).  
Nhat works in server components (authentication, provisioning, secured messaging, 
eKYC dashboard, …) of V-Key solutions. Main tasks: fix bugs, resolve client’s issues, 
implement and research enhancements, new components and features for company’s 
product, deploy server components to many different environments (application 
servers, databases), and go to customer’s place (data center) for troubleshoot, 
resolve production issues. 
Project Team Size 
10 
Skill Set  
Java/J2EE, Spring (Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud), ReactJs, Git, Jenkins, 
Linux, Mac OS, Apache Http server, Nginx, Apache Tomcat, Jboss, Oracle Weblogic, 
Docker, Oracle, SQL server, MySQL. 
Organization:  Sequent Asia IT (Sai Digital) 
Project: Beauty Garage 
Role: Technical Leader 
Project Description 
Build e-commerce solution for Beauty Garage client using SAP Hybris platform 
(www.beautygarage.jp). 
This e-commerce is for spa industry and integrates with SAP ERP. It also has another 
site (Eyelash Garage) for making beauty with glasses. 
Nhat does technical lead tasks: technical support, review code, assign tasks for 
members, estimate, research, implement complex tasks in the project and SAP ERP 
integration. 
Project Team Size 
25 
Skill Set  
Java/J2EE, Spring, SAP Hybris, Apache Solr, Git, Jenkins, Linux, Apache Http server, 
Apache Tomcat, AWS, MySQL. 
Organization:  Sequent Asia IT (Sai Digital) 
Project: Razer 
Role: Technical Leader 
Project Description 
Build e-commerce solution for Razer client using SAP Hybris platform. 
Focus in integration between Hybris and SAP ERP. Using Data Hub technology of 
Hybris. 
Project Team Size 
25 
Skill Set  
Java/J2EE, Spring Integration, Restful web services, Hybris (Data hub, order 
process), Git, Linux. 
Organization:  Sequent Asia IT 
Project: AIL 
Role: Senior Developer 
Project Description 
Arvind Limited (formerly Arvind Mills) is a textile manufacturer and 
the flagship company of the Arvind Group. It is India's largest denim 
manufacturer apart from being world’s fourth-largest producer and exporter of denim. 
Now Arvind want to leverage Hybris platform’s capability to build an Omnichannel 
solution for their e-commerce business.  
Project Team Size 
20 
Skill Set  
Java/J2EE, Spring (MVC) Framework, Hybris (ASM, CSCockpit, payment gateway, 
OCC), JQuery, Git, Message queue. 
Organization:  Sequent Asia IT 
Project: Essilor 
Role: Senior Developer 
Project Description 
Essilor has requested that SAI develop a Hybris B2C portal/website for their 
customer: Provision. 
Provision wants to provide Australian Eye Care Professionals (ECPs) with an online 
channel to sell their products 
Key tasks include build solr search, customize checkout process, customize cart, 
customize price and tax, implement all email features, build order management 
module, and generate receipts and reports. 
Project Team Size 
6-10 
Skill Set  
Java/J2EE, Spring (MVC) Framework, Hybris (Search, Price, Tax, Checkout process, 
Emailing, Order process), Apache Solr, Velocity, JQuery, SVN. 
Organization:  Sequent Asia IT 
Project: Bookworld 
Role: Senior Developer 
Project Description 
Bookworld wishes to move their current sites (www.bookworld.com.au 
and www.angusandrobertson.com.au) over into Hybris.  
There has been a platform RFP performed, where Hybris was chosen as the platform 
of choice. 
Key tasks include implementing new features in CS Cockpit, customizing CS Cockpit to 
support to sites, customize Order tab in CS cockpit, implement searching (product, 
customer, order) and voucher functionality in CS cockpit. Implement some features on 
storefront and export invoice for web site. 
Project Team Size 
6-10 
Skill Set  
Hybris (CS Cockpit, Storefront UI), Java/J2EE, Spring MVC Framework, Jasper Report, 
GIT. 
Organization:  Sequent Asia IT 
Project: Target 
Role: Senior Developer 
Project Description 
Target is a chain of discount stores that are about 95,000 to 135,000 square feet 
(12,000 m²) and carry hard lines, soft lines (clothing), and a limited amount of groceries, 
mostly non-perishable. Target has their shopping on line site (PC + Mobile platform) 
based on another framework and now Target wants to port their shopping on line site 
into Hybris. 
Nhat implements and customizes some features for CS Cockpit and data models. 
(www.target.com.au)  
Project Team  
6-10 
Skill Set  
Hybris (Core, CsCockpit), Oracle, Java/J2EE, Git. 
Organization:  Sequent Asia IT 
Project: EBD 
Role: Senior Developer 
Project Description 
Enable you to configure Buying Organizations, users, suppliers, and 
Market Site information. A host is any entity that provides procurement 
services to other companies. An enterprise typically corresponds to a single 
company, or business. Enterprises receive procurement services from hosts. 
An enterprise can contain one or more Buying Organizations 
Responsibilities: enhance, modify and explore the system. 
Project Team Size 
5 
Skill Set  
Java, Servlet/JSP, SQL Server, JRun, Windows. 
Organization:  Sequent Asia IT 
Project: Exxon Mobil  
Role: Senior Developer 
Project Description 
ExxonMobil is a web portal which is operating as a billing engine to calculate the fee for 
customers who have used ‘ExxonMobil’ card to spend petrol/diesel allowance in a period 
of time in a month. 
The system automatically uploads transaction files then calculate the 
discount/interest/fee…  for each card and send an alert email/SMS to each customer so 
they can go to their banks then pay for all their transactions during that time. 
Project Team Size  
10 
Skill Set 
Java, Spring, Hibernate, Jasper report, SQL Server, Eclipse, Tomcat, 
Windows 7 
Organization: Pyramid Consulting 
Project: ANP PRS 
Role: Senior Developer 
Project Description 
Press Release System helps journalist to create and publish press online 
Project Team Size  
5 
Skill Set  
EJB3, Spring, Hibernate, Restful API, Oracle, PostgreSQL, JQuery, Ajax, Linux (Ubuntu). 
Organization: Pyramid Consulting  
Project: Belga Dashboard 
Role: Senior Developer 
Project Description  
 Build a portal manages internal applications in Belga corporation. 
Project Team Size  
8 
Skill Set  
Spring, Hibernate, Web service, Oracle, Apache Tomcat, Google API, Linux (Ubuntu). 
Organization:  Netblue VN 
Project: Admodus – TrafficKing 
Role: Developer 
Project Description  
TrafficKing: system manages and configures advertisers, publishers; sets up relationship  
( ads  of  advertiser  will  be  served  by  what  publisher)  between advertiser and 
publisher. 
Admodus: system processes and tracks ad requests in real: decides what 
ad is displayed at a certain time in a specific publisher’s web site, renders it 
and collects user action data. 
Project Team Size  
20 
Skill Set  
Java, Servlet, Tapestry, Spring, Velocity, MySQL, Eclipse, Apache Tomcat, Windows XP, 
Linux. 
Organization:  Netblue Vietnam 
Project: SMP (SavingsMarketPlace) 
Role: Developer 
Project Description:  System has a web site delivers relevant savings in the form of coupons and 
discounts to their members. Moreover, it sends email with brand name offers and 
savings tips to its members and has campaigns to advertise, collect customer’s 
consumption tendency data. 
Project Team Size:  
15 
Skill Set:  
Java, Spring, Hibernate, Struts, JavaScript, Ajax, JQuery, HTML, CSS, 
MySQL, Eclipse, Apache Tomcat, Windows XP, Linux. 
Organization:  Officience 
Project: TBE 
Role: Developer 
Project Description:  Is a Transaction Business Engine:  supports  client  communicating  with company easily 
through a web system, include the following modules: project &  project  template  
management,  user  &  group  management,  chat  module, project searching engine & 
order project on line. 
Project Team Size:  
10 
Skill Set:  
Java, Struts2, Spring (Acegi), Hibernate, JavaScript, Ajax, JQuery, JSON, MySQL, Eclipse, 
Apache Tomcat, Windows XP, Linux. 
Organization:  FCGV 
Project: Cox iNav 
Role: Developer 
Project Description:  Provide employees a desktop environment that helps them to access 
information and support tools more quickly and easily, improves the call handling 
process, creates a “virtual” service  and  support  environment  that allows them to offer 
customers the local “feel” from a “global” rep to further enhance customer service. 
Create an environment where the desktop transformation will be employee 
friendly and will become accepted by all employees. 
Project Team Size:  
20 
Skill Set:  
Java, BEA Weblogic, Jacada Framework, Portal, JSP, Web Service, Page Flow 
Architecture, JavaScript, Ajax, Oracle, Windows XP.

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
